title: How to Cut Large Pieces of Meat for Grilling
description: Mike Evensen from Better Meat Company shows you how to use the tip of the knife to break down your own large cuts of meat.

asset.title: How to Cut Large Pieces of Meat for Grilling
asset.description: Mike Evensen from Better Meat Company shows you how to use the tip of the knife to break down your own large cuts of meat.
asset.author: Char-Broil Grills

transcripts: rade secret when you're using a knife to peel something like this apart, use the tip of your knife and not the blade of your knife. Use the blade of your knife and you were going to make cuts and marks all over the piece of meat. Use the tip of the knife. It comes off nice and clean just like that.
